code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{generateGherkin}from'../Services/api';import Loader from'./Loader';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Step3Generate=_ref=>{let{selectedUserStory,setGeneratedGherkin,onGenerated,setError}=_ref;const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const handleGenerate=async()=>{setIsLoading(true);setError('');try{const response=await generateGherkin(selectedUserStory.description);setGeneratedGherkin(response.data.gherkin_syntax);onGenerated();}catch(err){setError('Failed to generate Gherkin syntax from Gemini API.');}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-4",children:"Step 3: Analyze User Story"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded-md border mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"font-semibold text-lg mb-2",children:["Selected User Story: ",selectedUserStory.title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-700 whitespace-pre-wrap",children:selectedUserStory.description})]}),isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{text:"AI is analyzing the story..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleGenerate,className:"w-full bg-green-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg hover:bg-green-700 transition duration-300",children:"Generate Gherkin Syntax"})]});};export default Step3Generate;
